snippet: Iraq expressed "deep relief" at U.S. President Donald Trump's decision to remove Iraq from a list of countries targeted in a U.S. travel ban, the Iraqi foreign ministry said in a statement on Monday....

headline.main: EU Takes Big Step Toward Organic Food Deal With Chile
headline.print_headline: EU Takes Big Step Toward Organic Food Deal With Chile

lead_paragraph: Iraq expressed "deep relief" at U.S. President Donald Trump's decision to remove Iraq from a list of countries targeted in a U.S. travel ban, the Iraqi foreign ministry said in a statement on Monday.
